title: Brand new renovation! New kitchen & new bathroom! Hardwood floors!
posting_body: ['This unit is being completely renovated and will have a BRAND NEW kitchen and bathroom!', 'This spacious 3-bedroom unit is located on the Saugus line.', 'The new kitchen will have new stainless steel appliances.', 'Hardwood floors throughout!', 'The master bedroom has a large walk-in closet.', 'This unit has plenty of storage space!', 'Gleaming hardwood floors throughout!', 'Ample on-street parking.', 'Available August 15th', 'September 1st is the latest you can rent this unit for.', '***Please be sure to write your real email address in your initial inquiry***', 'Note, these pictures are of a similar unit in the same building', 'Qualifications:', '3 bedroom + 1 bathroom $2700 per month', 'Good credit + a minimum gross household income of $94k', 'To rent: First ($2700) + Last ($2700) + Security Deposit*', 'Secuirity deposit can be paid up front or in incruments', '$1,500 (up front)', '$300 (Month 2)', '$300 (Month 3)', '$300 (Month 4)', '$300 (Month 5)', '*Notes: No smoking*', 'Property Details:', 'Property Type:', 'Multi-family', 'Floor: 2nd', 'Heat: Gas', 'Parking: Plenty of street parking', 'Washer and Dryer: Available in the basement', 'Pets: Negotiable', 'The property abuts the Northern Strand Rail Trail which is a fantastic retreat from city life.', 'Enjoy the birds and wildlife while walking, jogging, biking, or rollerblading.', '10-minute drive to Wonderland T station.', 'The bus stop is a 2-minute walk from the front door.', 'Take the bus directly into the city or to Wonderland Station!', 'Surrounding communities include Revere, Saugus, Salem, Malden, Chelsea, Winthrop, Swampscott, Peabody, Wakefield, and Everett.']
